00029 const int    Element::INVALID_PROPERTY_VALUE = -2;
00030 
00031 const char * Element::mPropertyNames[] = {
00032         "symbol", // SYMBOL_PROPERTY
00033         "name", // NAME_PROPERTY
00034         "nucleons", // NUCLEONS_PROPERTY
00035         "electrons", // ELECTRONS_PROPERTY
00036         "atomic mass", // ELECTRONS_PROPERTY
00037         "abundance", // ABUNDANCE_PROPERTY
00038         "coherent length", // NEUTRON_SCATTERING_LENGTH_COHERENT_PROPERTY
00039         "incoherent length", // NEUTRON_SCATTERING_LENGTH_INCOHERENT_PROPERTY
00040         "coherent cross section", // NEUTRON_SCATTERING_CROSS_SECTION_COHERENT_PROPERTY
00041         "incoherent cross section", // NEUTRON_SCATTERING_CROSS_SECTION_INCOHERENT_PROPERTY
00042         "total cross section", // NEUTRON_SCATTERING_CROSS_SECTION_TOTAL_PROPERTY
00043         "absorption cross section", // NEUTRON_SCATTERING_CROSS_SECTION_ABSORPTION_PROPERTY
00044         "xray energies" // XRAY_SCATTERING_ENERGY_MAP_PROPERTY
00045 };
00046 
00047 Element::Element()
00048         : cfp::ChemicalElementInterface(),
00049           // init properties (max+1 to avoid out-of-range, see propertyConst())
00050           mProperties(INVALID_PROPERTY+1)
00051 {
00052         for(int i=0; i < propertyCount(); i++) {
00053                 Property p = getProperty(i);
00054                 switch(p) {
00055                         case STRING_TYPE:
00056                                 mProperties.at(p) = defaultValue(std::string(), p); break;
00057                         case INT_TYPE:
00058                                 mProperties.at(p) = defaultValue(int(), p); break;
00059                         case DOUBLE_TYPE:
00060                                 mProperties.at(p) = defaultValue(double(), p); break;
00061                         case COMPLEX_TYPE:
00062                                 mProperties.at(p) = defaultValue(complex(), p); break;
00063                         default:
00064                                 mProperties.at(p) = INVALID_PROPERTY_VALUE; break;
00065                 }
00066         }
00067 }
00068 
00069 Element::~Element()
00070 {
00071 }
00072 
00073 const char * 
00074 Element::propertyName(Property p)
00075 {
00076         if (p < 0 || p >= INVALID_PROPERTY) return "";
00077         return mPropertyNames[p];
00078 }
00079 
00080 int 
00081 Element::propertyCount()
00082 {
00083         return static_cast<int>(INVALID_PROPERTY);
00084 }
00085 
00086 Element::Property 
00087 Element::getProperty(int index) 
00088 {
00089         if (index < 0 || index > static_cast<int>(INVALID_PROPERTY)) 
00090                 return INVALID_PROPERTY;
00091         return static_cast<Property>(index);
00092 }
00093 
00094 bool 
00095 Element::isValidVariant(const PropertyVariant& var) 
00096 {
00097         return !(var.which() == 0 && 
00098                 boost::get<int>(var) == INVALID_PROPERTY_VALUE);
00099 }
00100 
00101 Element::PropertyType 
00102 Element::propertyType(Element::Property p)
00103 {
00104         switch (p) {
00105                 case SYMBOL_PROPERTY:
00106                 case NAME_PROPERTY:
00107                         return STRING_TYPE; break;
00108                 case NUCLEONS_PROPERTY:
00109                 case ELECTRONS_PROPERTY:
00110                         return INT_TYPE; break;
00111                 case ATOMIC_MASS_PROPERTY:
00112                 case ABUNDANCE_PROPERTY:
00113                 case NS_CS_COHERENT_PROPERTY:
00114                 case NS_CS_INCOHERENT_PROPERTY:
00115                 case NS_CS_TOTAL_PROPERTY:
00116                 case NS_CS_ABSORPTION_PROPERTY:
00117                         return DOUBLE_TYPE; break;
00118                 case NS_L_COHERENT_PROPERTY:
00119                 case NS_L_INCOHERENT_PROPERTY:
00120                         return COMPLEX_TYPE; break;
00121                 default:        // INVALID_PROPERTY
00122                         return INVALID_TYPE; break;
00123         }
00124 }
00125 
00126 bool 
00127 Element::isValidType(Property p, const PropertyVariant& var)
00128 {
00129         return (var.which() == propertyType(p));
00130 }
00131 
00132 bool 
00133 Element::isValid() const 
00134 {
00135         try {
00136                 const std::string& sym  = boost::get<std::string>(propertyConst(SYMBOL_PROPERTY));
00137                 const std::string& name = boost::get<std::string>(propertyConst(NAME_PROPERTY));
00138                 const int& nuc   = boost::get<int>(propertyConst(NUCLEONS_PROPERTY));
00139                 const int& elec  = boost::get<int>(propertyConst(ELECTRONS_PROPERTY));
00140                 const double& ab = boost::get<double>(propertyConst(ABUNDANCE_PROPERTY));
00141                 const double& am = boost::get<double>(propertyConst(ATOMIC_MASS_PROPERTY));
00142                 return !sym.empty() &&
00143                        !name.empty() &&
00144                        elec > 0 &&
00145                        nuc != 0 &&
00146                        ab >= 0.0 &&
00147                        am > 0.0;
00148         } catch(boost::bad_get e) { return false; }
00149 }
00150 
00151 const MapTriple& 
00152 Element::xrayCoefficients() const 
00153 {
00154         return mXrayCoefficients;
00155 }
00156 
00157 void 
00158 Element::addXrayCoefficient(double energy, double fp, double fpp)
00159 {
00160         size_t num = mXrayCoefficients.erase(energy);
00161         if (num > 0) {
00162 #ifdef DEBUG
00163                 std::cerr << "Element::addXrayCoefficient: "
00164                         << "Found duplicate: " << symbol() 
00165                         << " (" << energy << ", " << fp << ", " << fpp << ")"
00166                         << " -> overwritten !"
00167                         << std::endl;
00168 #endif
00169         }
00170         mXrayCoefficients.insert(std::make_pair(energy,
00171                                  std::make_pair(fp, fpp)));
00172 }

00174 Element::PropertyValueIteratorConst

00176 
00177 Element::PropertyValueIteratorConst 
00178 Element::endConst() const { return mProperties.end(); }

00180 Element::Property 
00181 Element::getProperty(const PropertyValueIteratorConst& iter) const 
00182 {
00183         return getProperty(iter - beginConst());
00184 }

00210 std::ostream& 
00211 operator<<(std::ostream& o, const Element& e)
00212 {
00213         Element::PropertyValueIteratorConst pit = e.beginConst();
00214         for(; pit != e.endConst(); pit++)
00215         {
00216                 o << *pit << " ";
00217         }
00218         o << std::endl;
00219         const MapTriple& map = e.xrayCoefficients();
00220         MapTriple::const_iterator it = map.begin();
00221         while (it != map.end() )
00222         {
00223                 o << it->first << "\t" << it->second.first << "\t" << it->second.second
00224                         << std::endl;
00225                 it++;
00226         }
00227         return o;
00228 }
00229 
00230 bool 
00231 std::operator<(const ::complex& a, const ::complex& b)
00232 {
00233         return
00234         (a.real()*a.real() + a.imag()*a.imag()) < 
00235         (b.real()*b.real() + b.imag()*b.imag());
00236 }

00282 int
00283 Element::defaultValue(int a, Element::Property p) { return 0; }
00284 
00285 double 
00286 Element::defaultValue(double a, Element::Property p) 
00287 {
00288         if (p == ABUNDANCE_PROPERTY) return -1.0;
00289         else                         return 0.0;
00290 }
00291 
00292 complex 
00293 Element::defaultValue(complex a, Element::Property p)
00294 {
00295         return complex(0.0, 0.0);
00296 }

00298 std::string 
00299 Element::defaultValue(std::string a, Element::Property p) { return ""; }

00301 const Element::PropertyVariant& 
00302 Element::propertyConst(Element::Property p) const { return mProperties.at(p); }
